document_data.name: Silmarien Silverleaf
document_data.mainbody: '''Silmarien Silverleaf''' was a [[moon elf]] from the realm of [[Synnoria]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]].
document_data.Description: Silmarien dressed in a blue shirt, green pants, and tall, brown leather boots. Over her shoulders was draped a purple cloak, as well as her lengthy gray hair.
document_data.Possessions: Among Silmarien's possessions were an ensorceled suit of [[chain mail]], a magical long sword that made her more effective in combat versus [[giant]]s, a pair of ''[[gauntlets of ogre power]]'', and a ''[[girdle of many pouches]]''.
document_data.Activities: In response to Synnoria's dwindling population, Silmarien took it upon herself to travel across [[Faer√ªn]] in search of male [[elf|elves]], hoping to attract some of them back to Synnoria for breeding.
